description: Detects the use of various web request commands with commandline tools and Windows PowerShell cmdlets (including aliases) viq CommandLine
author: James Pemberton / @4A616D6573
Endgame
JHasenbusch
oscd.community
Austin Songer @austinsonger
false_positives: Use of Get-Command and Get-Help modules to reference Invoke-WebRequest and Start-BitsTransfer.
name: Usage Of Web Request Commands And Cmdlets
query: process.command_line.text:(*Invoke\-WebRequest* OR *iwr\ * OR *wget\ * OR *curl\ * OR *Net.WebClient* OR *Start\-BitsTransfer* OR *Resume\-BitsTransfer* OR *\[System.Net.WebRequest\]\:\:create* OR *Invoke\-RestMethod* OR *WinHttp.WinHttpRequest*)
